name: Cutting Valuable Stones
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a Valuable Stone (ie: #L "Gem" "136641") #L "Jensen Gem Cutter" "151366" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Jensen Gem Cutter + a Valuable Stone = Perfectly Cut Valuable Stone (ie:#L "Perfectly Cut Gem" "151552") Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ This process transforms the Valuable Stone into a Perfectly Cut one, thus doubling its value. The result can also be used in the making of #L "Jewels" "/tell recipe 62".
